p: The B16 cells were seeded in a six-well plate (2×10 5 cells/ well) for 12h, after renewing the culture medium of the cells treated with different concentrations of AVO for 48h and washed with ice-cold PBS twice. Cells were lysed [ 16], and each lysate was taken 150 μl into a 96-well plate and measured; optical density of the solubilized melanin was measured at 405 nm by a multiplate reader. BCA Protein Assay Kit (Biomed, Beijing, China) was used to determine the protein concentration of each sample. The melanin content was normalized to the cellular protein concentration (abs melanin/ μg protein). The percentage value of the AVO treated cells was calculated with respect to the negative control [ 20].
